doku.title: Bookmarks
doku.author: BloodHeart
doku.entry:
##BOTNAME## Can remeber Websites;)
##BOTNAME## can remebers site names, If you use regular websites with long names all the time this is for you
!bookmark (Name you want to call website) HTTP://sitename.com
[quote]To set a Bookmark [quote]!bookmark mysite HTTP://sitename.com[/quote] To recall that Bookmark [quote]bookmark mysite[/quote] To Delete a Bookmark [quote]!DelBookmark mysite[/quote][/quote] You can also whisper commands as well
